course_description: The objective and goal of this course is to broaden your awareness of the impact of global economic, financial, political, and demographic trends on business.  The class provides conceptual frameworks and tools for analysis critical to conducting business in the international environment.  Implications for human as well as economic development are discussed.  The class will enable students to think globally and strategically; develop diverse perspectives on global business, the macroeconomy, and the future; and understand the increasing global connections that impact business and finance.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the One-Year or Two-Year MBA program.
